greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of Laguerre(n, -4).
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..491
program: (PARI) for(n=0,30, print1(numerator(sum(k=0,n, binomial(n,k)*(4^k/k!))), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, May 12 2018
(MAGMA) [Numerator((&+[Binomial(n,k)*(4^k/Factorial(k)): k in [0..n]])): n in [0..30]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, May 12 2018
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 14 2009
